metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17810 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc0, there is a "SEGV on unknown address"that will cause a remote denial of service attack, because asm/preproc.cmishandles macro calls that have the wrong number of arguments.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17810` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.11.08-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.11.08-1ubuntu0.1').
